title: Beauty fans turn to AI-customised foundation for 'perfect' skin tone match
description: DCYPHER has used artificial intelligence to create a new line of made-to-order skincare products that's the perfect match for one's skin tone.
content: The world of beauty is set to be revolutionised by artificial intelligence (AI), particularly in the realm of shade matching. Traditionally, beauty fans have been limited to a standard set of shades when purchasing foundation, often up to a maximum o... [3647 chars]

title: Why has Elon Musk’s xAI sued Apple, OpenAI?
description: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk’s AI company, xAI, has filed a lawsuit against Apple and OpenAI, accusing them of working together to stifle competition in artificial intelligence. The complaint claims that their agreement has ‘locked up markets’, challenging one of Apple’s most significant AI ventures and a landmark deal for OpenAI

title: Tax Deeds AI by Tax Lien Wealth Builders Launches National Workshops on AI-Driven Tax Deed Investing
description: Las Vegas, NV, Aug. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Tax Deeds AI, powered by Tax Lien Wealth Builders™ LLC, is hosting a series of hands-on workshops across the United States to help individuals learn the fundamentals of tax deed research and auctions with the support of artificial intelligence. The workshops are structured to provide step-by-step training that combines advanced data analysis with practical education that does not require a real estate license of a significant starting capital.

title: Elon Musk Accuses Apple, OpenAI of Stifling AI Competition in Antitrust Suit
description: \"This is a tale of two monopolists joining forces to ensure their continued dominance in a world rapidly driven by the most powerful technology humanity has ever created: artificial intelligence,\" the lawsuit asserts.
content:
New York: Elon Musk on Monday targeted Apple and OpenAI in an antitrust lawsuit alleging that the iPhone maker and the ChatGPT maker are teaming up to thwart competition in artificial intelligence.

title: US Attorneys General tell AI companies they 'will be held accountable' for child safety failures
description: The US Attorneys General of 44 jurisdictions have signed a letter, urging AI companies to protect children "from exploitation by predatory artificial intelligence products."

title: Musk's xAI sues Apple, OpenAI alleging antitrust violations
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — Elon Musk's companies xAI and X filed a sweeping US antitrust lawsuit Monday against Apple and OpenAI, alleging the tech giants formed an illegal partnership to stifle competition in artificial intelligence and smartphone markets.
content:
WASHINGTON, D.C. — Elon Musk's companies xAI and X filed a sweeping US antitrust lawsuit Monday against Apple and OpenAI, alleging the tech giants formed an illegal partnership to stifle competition in artificial intelligence and smartphone markets.

title: Generative AI model scans emergency notes to identify high-risk avian influenza exposures
description: Researchers from the University of Maryland School of Medicine developed a new and highly effective application of an artificial intelligence (AI) tool to quickly scan notes in electronic medical records and identify high-risk patients who may have been infected with H5N1 avian influenza or "bird flu", according to new findings published in the journal Clinical Infectious Diseases.

title: Google AI system promotes outlandish fake overview of Jeff Bezos mom's funeral: report
description: Google's Artificial Intelligence overview system promoted outlandish rumors about the funeral of Jeff Bezos' mother before the small ceremony even occurred -- including that rapper Eminem performed and Elon Musk made an appearance, according to a report.
